availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Madison County, Kentucky, native. Married to Sarah Oldham. Father of Elias Oldham, Elizabeth Oldham, Margaret Oldham, and Francis M. Oldham. Married to Dorothy C. Graham Oldham in Hopkins County, Kentucky, on October 24, 1859. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860. Employed William Graham as a farmer in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 1, p. 57B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 603.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994039, Hopkins County Marriages, p. 147-48.
